name: Hornet Virus: Steel Alcimus II
description:
Hornet Virus: Steel Alcimus II is a sequel of Steel Alcimus inspired by various 1980-1990s' 3D computer games. Pilot Videl air force's deadliest helicopter HCH-960C Super Aicimus in this action-packed 3D game. Destroy the targets, rescue the hostages, and capture the enemy buildings to save the world!

Features
  • Simplistic Arcade helicopter action in Full-3D environments
  • 5 playable helicopters and 14 weapons
  • Various game modes including 50 single missions, Dynamic campaign, Raid, and Air patrol
  • Partial controller support (Xinput controller required)
